title: Amazing basement room for rent with big backyard
posting_body: ['Looking to rent out one room in the basement of my Park Hill home for Sept. 1 move in date.', "The room will be available as early as Aug. 15 (14' x 11') - $750/month.", 'The basement is completely refurbished.', "It's a 3-bedroom, 1 bathroom basement with a giant, fecund back yard, perfect for someone with a friendly pup or two.", 'We love dogs (and cats)!', 'We would share bathroom, kitchen and living room.', 'Washer/dryer are included.', 'Kitchen is newly built with new appliances.', "Free parking off-street is available and we're half a block from two RTD bus stops; about a mile away from the Central Park light rail station.", "Located in AMAZING North Park Hill, close to (but not on) Monaco, right down the street from Stapleton, which has basically everything you need — King Soopers, Chipotle, Orange Theory, 1st Bank, Walgreens, Superfruit, Petsmart, Sam's Club, Walmart ...", 'you get it.', 'Also close to I-70 and very close to the UCHealth Stapleton Medical Center.', "About me: I'm a traveling journalist in my 30s, often away from home.", "I'm looking for a cool roommate who is sane and easygoing to share my newly purchased place and keep it intact while I'm on the road.", "No preference on gender, but I'm a guy, so you'll need to be OK with that.", 'The other roommate owns her own business.', 'Age is less important than maturity.', 'Must be willing to share the space and keep things fun and simple.', 'No drama.', 'Must have first month + security deposit and good credit to move in.', 'Month-to-month agreement.', 'No couples.', 'One person per room.', 'This is not negotiable.', 'Sorry.', "Please note: I'm looking to rent to someone starting September 1.", 'The room will NOT be held until October or November unless you pay for September.', "There is the possibility of early move-in, so please ask if you're interested in that.", 'If the ad is still up that means it is still available.', 'No need to send an email asking if it is.', 'Thanks!', 'I look forward to hearing from you.']
